11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ubadah bin As-Samit said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "There is no Salah for one who does not recite Fatihatil-Kitab or more

chapter.ara-name: باب إِيجَابِ قِرَاءَةِ فَاتِحَةِ الْكِتَابِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Obligation to recite Fatihatil-Kitab in the prayer
